Plot: Anger rages in Philip as he awaits the publication of his second novel. He feels pushed out of his adopted home city by the constant crowds and noise, a deteriorating relationship with his ...
Title: Listen Up Philip
Actors: Jason Schwartzman, Elisabeth Moss, Krysten Ritter, Joséphine de La Baume
tomatoConsensus: As thought-provoking as it is uncompromising, Listen Up Philip finds writer-director Alex Ross Perry taking a creative step forward while hearkening back to classic neurotic comedies of '70s cinema.
